idea-plugin.name: String Tools
idea-plugin.description:
Handy string tools
Handy string tools for converting (hex, binary, oct), encoding/decoding (URL, HTML, Base64) and computing HASH/CRCs.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
v2.0
    Added new operations
  • ASCII/OCT conversions
  • ROT13
  • MD5 hash
  • SHA256 hash
  • SHA512 hash
  • CRC32 checksum
  • LUHN digit generator
v3.0
    ttt
  • Fixed errors
  • Description in status bar is displayed for invalid input or error
v4.0
  • Fixed internal errors
  • Url endode/decode is rewritten based on rfc3986 Percent-Encoding
  • Dialog can be closed by ESC key
v4.1
  • Added JWT token decoder, SHA3 hashes, Keccak hashes and MD2/4 hashes
  • Fixed URL encode for ASCII values less than ascii code 32 (SPACE)
